examples.name: separator-vertical
separator-with-label
examples.content:
export const SeparatorWithLabel = () => {
  return (
    <Stack>
      <HStack>
        <Text flexShrink="0">Label (start)</Text>
        <Separator flex="1" />
      </HStack>

      <HStack>
        <Separator flex="1" />
        <Text flexShrink="0">Label (end)</Text>
      </HStack>

      <HStack>
        <Separator flex="1" />
        <Text flexShrink="0">Label (center)</Text>
        <Separator flex="1" />
      </HStack>
    </Stack>
  )
}
importPaths: import { HStack, Separator, Stack, Text } from "@chakra-ui/react"
